mapper.select: SELECT m.name AS label, IFNULL(GROUP_CONCAT(lc.importance ORDER BY lc.chart_date SEPARATOR ','), NULL) AS data FROM Member m LEFT JOIN LineChart lc ON lc.m_num = m.m_num AND lc.chart_date BETWEEN DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 14 DAY) AND CURRENT_DATE() GROUP BY m.m_num;
SELECT distinct chart_date FROM LineChart lc where lc.chart_date between DATE_SUB((current_date),INTERVAL 14 day) and (current_date) ORDER BY chart_date

SELECT m.name as label, lc.importance as data FROM Member m LEFT JOIN LineChart lc ON lc.m_num = m.m_num WHERE lc.chart_date BETWEEN DATE_SUB((current_date), INTERVAL 14 DAY) AND (current_date) ORDER BY lc.chart_date;
